GAMEPLAY_TrekSleepingBagDescription.English: A high quality sleeping bag made to endure long journeys. Durable, warm, and protective. Comes with a string bag for easy carrying.
GAMEPLAY_TrekSleepingBagDescription.French (France): Un sac de couchage fabriqué pour les voyages longue durée. Résistant, chaud et offrant une bonne protection. Fournis avec un sac de transport facile.
GAMEPLAY_TrekSleepingBagDescription.Turkish: Uzun yolculuklara dayanmak için üretilmiş yüksek kaliteli bir uyku tulumu. Dayanıklı, sıcak ve koruyucu. Kolay taşıma için ipli bir çanta ile birlikte gelir.
GAMEPLAY_TrekSleepingBagDescription.Russian: Высококачественный спальный мешок, созданный для длительных путешествий. Прочный, теплый и дающий хорошую защиту. В комплекте идет авоська для удобной переноски.

GAMEPLAY_DeerSleepingBag.French (France): Sac de Couchage en peau de biche

GAMEPLAY_DeerSleepingBagDescription.English: Warm, durable, and heavy as a deer. The smell might attract some predators.
GAMEPLAY_DeerSleepingBagDescription.French (France): Chaud, résistant, et aussi lourd qu'une biche. L'odeur pourrais attirer des prédateurs.
GAMEPLAY_DeerSleepingBagDescription.Turkish: Sıcak, dayanıklı ve bir geyik kadar ağır. Kokusu bazı yırtıcıları çekebilir.
GAMEPLAY_DeerSleepingBagDescription.Russian: Теплый, прочный и тяжелый, - прямо как олень. Запах может привлечь хищников.

GAMEPLAY_StoneHammerDescription.English: A primitive version of a standard hammer. Less durable and not as effective, however a bit lighter.
GAMEPLAY_StoneHammerDescription.French (France): Une forme primitive d'un marteau standard. Peu résistant et moins efficace, un peu plus léger malgré cela.
GAMEPLAY_StoneHammerDescription.Turkish: Standart bir çekicin ilkel bir versiyonu. Daha az dayanıklıdır ve o kadar etkili değildir, ancak biraz daha hafiftir.
GAMEPLAY_StoneHammerDescription.Russian: Примитивная версия стандартного молота. Менее прочный и не такой эффективный, однако меньше весит.

GAMEPLAY_BigChoppingAxeDescription.English: A big durable axe used for splitting logs. It's certainly not the lightest you can choose from.
GAMEPLAY_BigChoppingAxeDescription.French (France): Un Merlin. Grosse hache résistante fabriquée pour couper du bois. Ce n'est pas la plus légère que vous puissiez choisir.
GAMEPLAY_BigChoppingAxeDescription.Turkish: Kütükleri bölmek için kullanılan büyük ve dayanıklı bir balta. Aralarından seçebileceğiniz en hafif balta olmadığı kesin.
GAMEPLAY_BigChoppingAxeDescription.Russian: Большой прочный топор, используемый для колки бревен. Точно не самый легкий вариант, который вы можете выбрать.

GAMEPLAY_FlintKnifeDescription.English: One of the oldest tools created by humanity. It's not that sharp or strong, but if they used it to survive, then maybe you can too.
GAMEPLAY_FlintKnifeDescription.French (France): L'un des plus vieux outils créer par l'humanité. Pas vraiment tranchant ni costaud, mais s'ils ont pu l'utiliser pour survivre, peut être que vous le pouvez aussi.
GAMEPLAY_FlintKnifeDescription.Turkish: İnsanlığın yarattığı en eski aletlerden biri. O kadar keskin ya da güçlü değil ama onlar hayatta kalmak için bunu kullandıysa, belki siz de kullanabilirsiniz.
GAMEPLAY_FlintKnifeDescription.Russian: Один из древнейших инструментов, созданных человечеством. Не такой уж острый и прочный, но если предки использовали его, чтобы выжить, то, возможно, и вы тоже сможете.

GAMEPLAY_BoneKnifeDescription.English: The sharpened end of the animal bone ensures practicality as a knife, but it won't last long.
GAMEPLAY_BoneKnifeDescription.French (France): la face aiguisée d'un os d'animal permet de l'utiliser comme un couteau, mais ça ne durera pas très longtemps.
GAMEPLAY_BoneKnifeDescription.Turkish: Hayvan kemiğinin keskin ucu bir bıçak olarak pratiklik sağlar, ancak uzun süre dayanmaz.
GAMEPLAY_BoneKnifeDescription.Russian: Заостренный конец кости животного. Может послужить как нож, но надолго его не хватит.

GAMEPLAY_CarpenterAxeDescription.English: An axe made specifically for carving into wood. Very sharp and larger than a regular hatchet. Whoever the owner was, they took good care of it.
GAMEPLAY_CarpenterAxeDescription.French (France): Une hache faite spécifiquement pour sculpter le bois. Très aguisée et plus large qu'une hachette. Qui qu'ai été le propriétaire de cet objet, ils en ont pris grand soin.
GAMEPLAY_CarpenterAxeDescription.Turkish: Özellikle ahşap oymak için yapılmış bir balta. Çok keskin ve normal bir baltadan daha büyük. Sahibi her kimse, ona iyi bakmış.
GAMEPLAY_CarpenterAxeDescription.Russian: Топор, сделанный специально для работы с деревом. Очень острый и больше обычного топора. Кем бы ни был его владелец, он хорошо позаботился об инструменте.

GAMEPLAY_SmallBirdStatueColorDescription.English: A small wooden statue resembling a colorful bird. Even though the paint is now fading, it's still beautiful in a way.
GAMEPLAY_SmallBirdStatueColorDescription.French (France): Une petite statue de bois ressemblant à un oiseau coloré. Bien que la peinture s'efface, elle est toujours belle d'une certaine manière.
GAMEPLAY_SmallBirdStatueColorDescription.Turkish: Renkli bir kuşu andıran küçük ahşap bir heykel. Boyası artık solmuş olsa da, bir şekilde hala güzel.
GAMEPLAY_SmallBirdStatueColorDescription.Russian: Небольшая деревянная статуэтка, напоминающая разноцветную птицу. Несмотря на то, что краска уже выцвела, она по-прежнему красива.

GAMEPLAY_HacksawLightDescription.English: A small light hacksaw used for cutting applications in need of a neater finish. It will take some time to slice through bigger things. The blade is easily swappable making repairs starightforward.
GAMEPLAY_HacksawLightDescription.French (France): Une petite scie à métaux, utilisée pour des finitions plus propres. Cela prendra un moment pour couper des choses plus grosses. la lame est facile à remplacer, facilitant les réparations.
GAMEPLAY_HacksawLightDescription.Turkish: Daha düzgün bir yüzey gerektiren kesme uygulamaları için kullanılan küçük, hafif bir demir testeresi. Daha büyük şeyleri kesmek biraz zaman alacaktır. Bıçağı kolayca değiştirilebilir ve onarımları kolaylaştırır.
GAMEPLAY_HacksawLightDescription.Russian: Небольшая легкая ножовка, используемая для резки изделий, к которым нужен более аккуратный подход. Чтобы разрезать вещи покрупнее, потребуется некоторое время. Лезвие легко заменяется, что упрощает ремонт.

GAMEPLAY_HunterKnifeDescription.English: A heavy combat knife designed for killing, will cut right through any flesh. It features a custom-made engraved handle.
GAMEPLAY_HunterKnifeDescription.French (France): Un couteau de combat lourd fabriqué pour tuer, coupera à travers toute chair. On peux observer une gravure personnalisée sur le manche.
GAMEPLAY_HunterKnifeDescription.Turkish: Öldürmek için tasarlanmış ağır bir savaş bıçağı, her eti keser. Özel yapım oymalı bir sapa sahiptir.
GAMEPLAY_HunterKnifeDescription.Russian: Тяжелый боевой нож, предназначенный для убийства, прорежет любую плоть. На ручке нанесена индивидуальная гравировка.

GAMEPLAY_BlacksmithHammerDescription.English: Heavy duty hammer designed for smithing. It might slow you down but it will do the job just right.
GAMEPLAY_BlacksmithHammerDescription.French (France): Marteau lourd fabriqué pour forger. Peux vous ralentir mais fera le boulot sans problème.
GAMEPLAY_BlacksmithHammerDescription.Turkish: Demircilik için tasarlanmış ağır hizmet çekici. Sizi yavaşlatabilir ama işinizi tam olarak yapacaktır.
GAMEPLAY_BlacksmithHammerDescription.Russian: Мощный молот, предназначенный для кузнечного дела. Может немного замедлить вас, но со своей задачей справится.
